com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling

Class HighCapacityIndexerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.persisted.journaling.HighCapacityIndexerFactory

  • public class HighCapacityIndexerFactory
extends Object
    Depending on configuration this factory will create HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStoreSharedThreadIndexer or HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStoreOwnThreadIndexer. If configured numberOfThreads is greater than zero shared thread will be used for store indexing. If numberOfThreads is zero there will be one indexer thread per store HighCapacityIndexedJournalingPersistentStore.
